title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-hosted LLM runner with a built-in model library (Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, …) and both CLI and REST APIs.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API—works in Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull models with a few lines.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration letting you use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat node.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured chat WebUI (like ChatGPT UI) that talks to your local Ollama instance.

title: chainlit-ollama
summary: Cookbook showing how to plug Ollama models into Chainlit conversational apps.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.x integration that uses Ollama models for generative or embedding pipelines.

title: ollama-copilots
summary: Lightweight GitHub Copilot-style VS-Code extension backed by local Ollama models.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + LlamaIndex to chat with local docs.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI wrapper with fuzzy-find model picker & chat REPL.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, list models from JVM apps.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async streaming, chat & embedding helpers.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up an Ollama service container for CI pipelines.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selector & PVC support.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Official nixpkgs derivation for Ollama with CUDA & ROCm variants.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official multi-arch Docker images (CPU, CUDA, ROCm) plus compose examples.

title: ollama-vscode
summary: VS-Code extension that adds “Ask Ollama” command panel using your local models.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack bot server that answers channel questions using any Ollama model.

title: r/ollama - Local LLM Ecosystem Discussion
summary: Active Reddit thread where users share favorite tools & libraries that plug into Ollama.
